Class Semicircle

  • java.lang.Object
    • Shapes
      • TwoDimensionalShape
        • Elipse
          • Circle
            • Semicircle

  • public class Semicircle
extends Circle
    Semicircle extends circle as it shares almost every method and variable as Circle. Just modified slightly
